transcript:
Hello.
Hello.
Hello yes.
Very good evening. Am I talking to Mr. Nivesh?
Yes, yes, yes.
Hi Nivesh actually my name is Naveen I was calling from India Mart office Noida how are you?
Okay okay. Sir if you don't mind like I am on a temple sir can I give you a call back in another 15 minutes time sir?
Yes sir Nivesh sir actually Avnish has sent you the details we have rectified the GST issue that you are facing. Okay okay you can close the concern you can close the concern okay.
Thank you so much thank you so much. Thanks thanks thanks thanks. Have a nice day sir.
summary:
